content:
TITLE: Facebook Post Embedding in React DESCRIPTION: Example of how to import and use the FacebookEmbed component to display a Facebook post with custom width. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-10_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import { FacebookEmbed } from 'react-social-media-embed'; ``` LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Instagram Post Embedding in React DESCRIPTION: Examples showing how to embed Instagram posts with and without captions using the InstagramEmbed component. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-10_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import { InstagramEmbed } from 'react-social-media-embed'; ``` LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ```
``` LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: LinkedIn Post Embedding in React DESCRIPTION: Example of embedding a LinkedIn post using the LinkedInEmbed component with custom dimensions. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-10_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import { LinkedInEmbed } from 'react-social-media-embed'; ``` LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Pinterest Pin Embedding in React DESCRIPTION: Example of embedding a Pinterest pin using the PinterestEmbed component with custom dimensions. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-10_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import { PinterestEmbed } from 'react-social-media-embed'; ``` LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing TikTokEmbed in a React Component DESCRIPTION: Example of using the TikTokEmbed component in a React application, centered with a specified width of 325 pixels. Demonstrates the URL format required for TikTok posts. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-10_snippet_8 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing XEmbed in a React Component DESCRIPTION: Example of using the XEmbed component to embed X (Twitter) content in a React application, centered with a specified width of 325 pixels. Shows the required URL format. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-10_snippet_10 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing YouTubeEmbed in a React Component DESCRIPTION: Example of using the YouTubeEmbed component in a React application, centered with specific width and height values. Uses the react-youtube package internally. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-10_snippet_12 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ```
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Implementing YouTube Embed with Thumbnail Refetching in React DESCRIPTION: This code snippet demonstrates how to use the YouTubeEmbed component with a solution for triggering thumbnail refetching to address pixelation issues. It uses React useState hook to dynamically adjust the embed height. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-10_snippet_14 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` const YOUTUBE_DEFAULT_HEIGHT = 390; const [embedHeight, setEmbedHeight] = React.useState(YOUTUBE_DEFAULT_HEIGHT); (await r.target.getIframe()).addEventListener('load', () => setEmbedHeight((height) => height + 1)), }} /> ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing React Social Media Embed Package DESCRIPTION: NPM installation command for the react-social-media-embed package. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-10_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm i react-social-media-embed ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing TikTokEmbed Component in React DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import the TikTokEmbed component from the react-social-media-embed library for use in a React application. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-10_snippet_7 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import { TikTokEmbed } from 'react-social-media-embed'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing XEmbed Component in React DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import the XEmbed component (for Twitter content) from the react-social-media-embed library for use in a React application. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-10_snippet_9 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import { XEmbed } from 'react-social-media-embed'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing YouTubeEmbed Component in React DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import the YouTubeEmbed component from the react-social-media-embed library for use in a React application. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-10_snippet_11 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import { YouTubeEmbed } from 'react-social-media-embed'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing PlaceholderEmbed Component in React DESCRIPTION: Shows how to import the PlaceholderEmbed component from the react-social-media-embed library for use as a loading placeholder. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-10_snippet_13 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import { PlaceholderEmbed } from 'react-social-media-embed'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing and Rendering README in Storybook DESCRIPTION: This code snippet imports necessary components from Storybook and the project's README.md file. It then sets up a Storybook documentation page that renders the README content using the Markdown component. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/src/stories/core/1.README.stories.mdx#2025-04-10_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'; import { Markdown } from '@storybook/blocks'; import Readme from '../../../README.md?raw'; {Readme} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: LinkedIn IFrame Embed HTML DESCRIPTION: Example of the LinkedIn iframe HTML code used to get the embed URL. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-10_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Embedding Pinterest Pins with HTML Iframe DESCRIPTION: Example of the HTML iframe code generated by Pinterest for embedding a pin. The iframe includes the pin ID, specified height and width attributes, and is accessed via the 'Get Pin embed code' option. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-10_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing and Rendering Code of Conduct in Storybook DESCRIPTION: Sets up Storybook documentation by importing necessary components from Storybook addons and rendering a Code of Conduct markdown file using the Markdown component. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/src/stories/core/2.CODE_OF_CONDUCT.stories.mdx#2025-04-10_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: jsx CODE: ``` import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'; import { Markdown } from '@storybook/blocks'; import CodeOfConduct from '../../../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md?raw'; {CodeOfConduct} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing Components for Storybook License Page in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Imports necessary components from Storybook and the project's LICENSE.md file to create a license documentation page. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/src/stories/core/3.LICENSE.stories.mdx#2025-04-10_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs'; import { Markdown } from '@storybook/blocks'; import License from '../../../LICENSE.md'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Storybook Meta for License Page in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Sets the title of the Storybook page to 'License' using the Meta component. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/src/stories/core/3.LICENSE.stories.mdx#2025-04-10_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Rendering License Content with Markdown in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: Uses the Markdown component to render the imported License content on the Storybook page. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/src/stories/core/3.LICENSE.stories.mdx#2025-04-10_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: JavaScript CODE: ``` {License} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Running Project Updater in Shell DESCRIPTION: Command to run the built-in project updater that synchronizes the project with the starter template. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/MAINTENANCE.md#2025-04-10_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: shell CODE: ``` npm run update ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Applying Monospace Font Styling in CSS DESCRIPTION: Applies a monospace font to all elements on the license page for consistent formatting. SOURCE: https://github.com/justinmahar/react-social-media-embed/blob/master/src/stories/core/3.LICENSE.stories.mdx#2025-04-10_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: CSS CODE: ``` * { font-family: monospace !important; } ```
